name: Malta Air Traffic Controllers' Association
goal: The Malta Air Traffic Controllers' Association (MATCA) is the sole professional association that represents 100% of the  Maltese Air Traffic Controllers. MATCA is also a registered trade union and has 53 licensed Air Traffic Controllers as members.
interests: Employment and Social Affairs, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Research and innovation, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives:
Single European Sky initiatives and
ATCO training and licensing regulations
